talkgroups.name: Northeast Mississippi
talkgroups.description: Regional communications for northeast Mississippi including Corinth, Tupelo, Amory, Oxford, New Albany, Starkville and surrounding areas. Please limit traffic to NE MS region only.

talkgroups.name: Mississippi Statewide
talkgroups.description: Mississippi statewide communications. Use for short conversations and as a calling channel. Move to TAC groups for extended QSOs.

talkgroups.name: North America
talkgroups.description: Continental North America talkgroup. All North American stations welcome. Popular for regional nets and general conversation.

talkgroups.name: Worldwide
talkgroups.description: Global communications talkgroup. Very active with stations from around the world. Use with caution on repeaters due to high traffic volume.

talkgroups.name: Parrot (Echo Test)
talkgroups.description: Echo test service - make a PRIVATE call to 9990 to test your audio and connection. Your transmission will be echoed back to you. Maximum 90 seconds.
talkgroups.note: Configure as PRIVATE CALL, not Group Call
